Localization.Name: Anvil Aerospace
Localization.Description: For civilians, Anvil Aerospace produces small fighting craft but with less of the pirate stigma. These ships are more expensive, less spit-and-glue, and built to take more hits than a comparable Drake model. The bulk of Anvil's income is from its military contracts with the UEE to design and build their warships, especially the iconic Hornet.

English.Name: Anvil Aerospace
English.Description: For civilians, Anvil Aerospace produces small fighting craft but with less of the pirate stigma. The bulk of Anvil's income is from its military contracts with the UEE to design and build their warships, especially the iconic Hornet.
